description:
The Product and Partner Go-to-Market (PPG) team at YouTube is focused on educating and activating YouTube content partners, consumers and our internal teams. We help develop Go-to-Market resources for products, policies and content strategies that are strategically important for YouTube’s ecosystems. A core component of our Go-to-Market offering is called Business Plans. This resource helps our partners lean into the platform through education on our value proposition, and the execution of shared business goals.

As a Go-to-Market Operations Specialist, you'll define, organize and drive complex initiatives to continuously improve Business Plans. You will work closely with Partnerships, Operations, Tools, and Sales to scale new Business Plan resources to all managed partner facing teams.

At YouTube, we believe that everyone deserves to have a voice, and that the world is a better place when we listen, share, and build community through our stories. We work together to give everyone the power to share their story, explore what they love, and connect with one another in the process. Working at the intersection of cutting-edge technology and boundless creativity, we move at the speed of culture with a shared goal to show people the world. We explore new ideas, solve real problems, and have fun — and we do it all together.
eeo: At Google, we don’t just accept difference—we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products and our community. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing this form.
qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • BA/BS degree or equivalent practical experience.
  • 5 years of experience working in project management, operations or management consulting capacity.

Preferred qualifications:

  • Master's degree in Business Administration or equivalent practical experience.
  • Experience of working in a partner facing capacity e.g. Sales, Account Management or Business Development.
  • Knowledge of SQL language and ability to extract, cross-reference and interpret data from different sources.
  • Ability to scale operations in a complex, changing business climate.
  • Entrepreneurial and analytical approach to uncovering needs, anticipating challenges and developing solutions.
  • Excellent written and oral communication skills, with the ability to communicate and influence effectively at multiple levels including; executive leadership, peers, and managers.
responsibilities:
• Lead cross-functional teams of Content Strategists, Data Analysts, Tools Product Leads and Partnerships team members to set OKRs, develop and scale new Business Plan resources, and drive process innovations to meet the changing needs of the business.
  • Analyze and interpret Business Plan satisfaction, usage and completion data, define patterns and deliver recommendations based on data.
  • Lead Executive review forums and operational reviews to drive critical decisions, and create alignment on long term strategy and resourcing needs.
  • Partner with Google Sales solutions team to continuously drive improvements to the Business Plan process, goal setting, and measurement.
  • Design and execute training materials to establish baseline education with new hires, and up-skill existing partner-facing teams.
title: Go-to-Market Operations Specialist, Business Plans
